apiClassifier.shortdesc: Appliaction entry point It reads bottom up for easy developement

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: Appliaction entry point It reads bottom up for easy developement

apiValue.shortdesc: Set the LoaderAnimation if preloading the Main app.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Set the LoaderAnimation if preloading the Main app. Set by MainPreloader.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Preloader It is compiled into a SWF that is loaded from swfobject.js.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: Preloader It is compiled into a SWF that is loaded from swfobject.js. This object loads the Main app and addsit to stage.

apiConstructor.shortdesc: Constructor creates Loader and LoaderAnimation instances.

apiConstructorDetail.apiDesc: Constructor creates Loader and LoaderAnimation instances.
